io.spine.server.model.declare

Class MethodParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.declare.MethodParams

  • public final class MethodParams
extends java.lang.Object
    The utility class for working with Method parameters.

    • Method Summary

      static boolean consistsOfSingle(java.lang.Class<?>[] methodParams, java.lang.Class<?> type)

    • Method Detail

      • consistsOfSingle

        public static boolean consistsOfSingle(java.lang.Class<?>[] methodParams,
                                       java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Checks whether the given method parameters have exactly one parameter of an expected type.

        This is a convenience shortcut for consistsOfTypes(Class[], List).

        Parameters:
        methodParams - the method parameters to check
        type - the type of expected single parameter
        Returns:
        true if the method has exactly one parameter of the expected type, false otherwise

      • consistsOfTwo

        public static boolean consistsOfTwo(java.lang.Class<?>[] methodParams,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> firstType,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> secondType)
        Checks whether the given method parameters are two parameters of expected types.

        This is a convenience shortcut for consistsOfTypes(Class[], List).

        Parameters:
        methodParams - the method parameters to check
        firstType - the expected type of the first parameter
        secondType - the expected type of the second parameter
        Returns:
        true if the method parameters are of expected types, false otherwise

      • consistsOfTypes

        public static boolean consistsOfTypes(java.lang.Class<?>[] methodParams,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> expectedTypes)
        Checks whether the given method parameters are of expected types.
        Parameters:
        methodParams - the method params to check
        expectedTypes - the expected types
        Returns:
        true if the method parameters are of expected types, false otherwise

      • isFirstParamCommand

        public static boolean isFirstParamCommand(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Finds out if the first method parameter is a Command message.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to inspect
        Returns:
        true if the first parameter is a Command message, false otherwise
